diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CA$ is $y$ units
The length of the line $DC$ is $x$ units
The length of the line $DB$ is $8$ units
The length of the line $DA$ is $3$ units
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $A$
The line connecting $B$ and $C$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $C$ and $A$
The line connecting $D$ and $C$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $D$ and $B$
